official_title: A resolution concerning the election of Carl Albert, Speaker, and W. Pat Jennings, Clerk.

summary.text: Provides that the Clerk be instructed to inform the President of the United States that the House of Representatives has elected Carl Albert, a Representative from the State of Oklahoma, Speaker; and W. Pat Jennings, a citizen of the Commonwealth of Virginia, Clerk of the House of Representatives of the Ninety-third Congress.

titles.title: A resolution concerning the election of Carl Albert, Speaker, and W. Pat Jennings, Clerk.
